name: Dark Ice Scream New Episode
description:
A new chapter is here! The scary story of a boy in Dark Ice Scream Town. Now the evil Ice Scream man has prepared an evil plan… Will you be able to help him escape and save his life??
Come on, the citizens are all scared and waiting for you!
You have to save yourself and the town from the evil plans of ice cream man.
Solve the mistery and escape safe of all this madness... but remember, you need to be more clever than ever!

In this game you'll find:
- Enhanced graphics and new levels
- Escape room mistery action game
- Horror stories to have fun!
- You can choose and take your decissions on the story to custom your experience
- Save the Dark Town neighbours from evilness!

Have fun!
